type:
∀ {x α : Real} {q : Nat → Rat},
  (Chapter6.Sequence.ofNatFun fun n => (q n).cast).TendsTo α →
    ∀ (M : Real),
      GE.ge M 0 →
        (Chapter6.Sequence.ofNatFun fun n => (q n).cast).BoundedBy M →
          Real.linearOrder.lt 1 x →
            Real.instLE.le 1 x →
              ∀ (ε : Real),
                GT.gt ε 0 →
                  ∀ (N K : Nat),
                    Real.instLE.le
                        (abs (instHSub.hSub (instHPow.hPow x (Real.instDivInvMonoid.inv (instHAdd.hAdd K.cast 1))) 1))
                        (instHMul.hMul ε (instHPow.hPow x (Real.instNeg.neg M))) →
                      ∀ (n m : Nat),
                        instLENat.le N n →
                          instLENat.le N m →
                            Real.instLE.le (abs (instHSub.hSub (q n).cast (q m).cast))
                                (Real.instDivInvMonoid.inv (instHAdd.hAdd K.cast 1)) →
                              Rat.linearOrder.le (q m) (q n) →
                                Real.instLE.le (instHPow.hPow x (q m).cast) (instHPow.hPow x (q n).cast) →
                                  Real.instPreorder.le
                                    (instHSub.hSub (instHPow.hPow x (instHDiv.hDiv 1 (instHAdd.hAdd K.cast 1))) 1)
                                    (instHMul.hMul ε (instHPow.hPow x (Real.instNeg.neg M)))

type:
∀ {x : Real} {q q' : Nat → Rat},
  (Exists fun L =>
      ∀ (ε : Real),
        Real.instLT.lt 0 ε →
          Exists fun N =>
            And (Int.instLEInt.le 0 N)
              (∀ (n : Int),
                Int.instLEInt.le (Int.instMax.max 0 N) n →
                  Real.instLE.le
                    (Real.pseudoMetricSpace.dist
                      (if h : Int.instLEInt.le (Int.instMax.max 0 N) n then
                        ite (Int.instLEInt.le 0 n)
                          (instHPow.hPow x (Real.instRatCast.ratCast (instHSub.hSub q q' n.toNat))) 0
                      else 0)
                      L)
                    ε)) →
    Exists fun x_1 =>
      ∀ (ε : Real),
        Real.instLT.lt 0 ε →
          Exists fun N =>
            And (Int.instLEInt.le (instHMul.hMul (-1) N) 0)
              (∀ (n : Int),
                Int.instLEInt.le (instHAdd.hAdd (instHMul.hMul (-1) n) (Int.instMax.max 0 N)) 0 →
                  Real.instLE.le
                    (Real.pseudoMetricSpace.dist
                      (ite (Int.instLEInt.le (instHAdd.hAdd (instHMul.hMul (-1) n) (Int.instMax.max 0 N)) 0)
                        (ite (Int.instLEInt.le (instHMul.hMul (-1) n) 0)
                          (instHPow.hPow x (Real.instRatCast.ratCast (instHSub.hSub q q' n.toNat))) 0)
                        0)
                      x_1)
                    ε)

  Int.instLTInt.lt a
      (Int.instMax.max
        { m := 0,
            seq := fun n =>
              ite (Int.instLEInt.le 0 n) (instHPow.hPow x (Real.instRatCast.ratCast (instHSub.hSub q q' n.toNat))) 0,
            vanish := ⋯ }.m
        N) →
    Eq
      (if h :
          GE.ge a
            (Int.instMax.max
              { m := 0,
                  seq := fun n =>
                    ite (Int.instLEInt.le 0 n) (instHPow.hPow x (Real.instRatCast.ratCast (instHSub.hSub q q' n.toNat)))
                      0,
                  vanish := ⋯ }.m
              N) then
        { m := 0,
              seq := fun n =>
                ite (Int.instLEInt.le 0 n) (instHPow.hPow x (Real.instRatCast.ratCast (instHSub.hSub q q' n.toNat))) 0,
              vanish := ⋯ }.seq
          ⟨a, h⟩.val
      else 0)
      0
